comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
    * Mesh builder object. It starts empty and requires the user to
    * add all the vertex and index allocations that comprise the
    * mesh
    *

methods.name: public int getCurrentVertexTypeIndex()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * @return internal index of the last vertex buffer type added to
        *         builder
        *

methods.name: public int getCurrentIndexSetIndex()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * @return internal index of the last index set added to the
        *         builder
        *

methods.name: public AllocationBuilder addVertexAllocation(Allocation a) throws IllegalStateException
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds an allocation containing vertex buffer data to the
        * builder
        *
        * @param a vertex data allocation
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public AllocationBuilder addIndexSetAllocation(Allocation a, Primitive p)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds an allocation containing index buffer data and index type
        * to the builder
        *
        * @param a index set data allocation, could be null
        * @param p index set primitive type
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public AllocationBuilder addIndexSetType(Primitive p)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds an index set type to the builder
        *
        * @param p index set primitive type
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public Mesh create()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Create a Mesh object from the current state of the builder
